mapper.update: UPDATE hairdcard set username = #{username},telephone = #{telephone},amout = #{amout},times = #{times} where id = #{id}
UPDATE hairdcard set status = #{status} where cardId = #{cardId}
mapper.select: select h.id as id,username,telephone,amout,times,h.cardId as cardId,c.cardId as acardId,cutdate,status from hairdcard h left join cutlog c on h.cardId = c.cardId where h.cardId = #{cardId}
